    public class ActivityConsultar
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Created by Oscar on 29/06/2017. ActivityConsultar is the class which extends of AppCompatActivity and set the context view to consult the existing wifi elements.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oscar Caparros

      • addFilaALaTabla

        private void addFilaALaTabla(java.lang.String lugar,
                             java.lang.String nombre,
                             java.lang.String clave,
                             android.widget.TableRow filaTabla,
                             int numeroTotal)
        addFilaTabla() adds to the TableLayout a new row with a new wifi element information.
        Parameters:
        lugar - Site of the wifi element.
        nombre - Name of the wifi element.
        clave - Password of the wifi element.
        filaTabla - Row of the wifi element.
        numeroTotal - Number of wifi elements in the database.
